verses.verse: כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- When יִקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> yik-Kach hath taken אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish When a man אִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah a wife וּבְעָלָ֑הּ <S%H1166><s%> u-ve-'a-Lah; and married וְהָיָ֞ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah happens אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- lo לֹ֧א <S%H3808><s%> lo no תִמְצָא־ <S%H4672><s%> tim-tza- her and it come to pass that she find חֵ֣ן <S%H2580><s%> chen no favour בְּעֵינָ֗יו <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nav, in his eyes כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- because מָ֤צָא <S%H4672><s%> Ma-tza because he hath found בָהּ֙ vah עֶרְוַ֣ת <S%H6172><s%> 'er-Vat uncleanness דָּבָ֔ר <S%H1697><s%> da-Var, some וְכָ֨תַב <S%H3789><s%> ve-Cha-tav in her then let him write לָ֜הּ lah סֵ֤פֶר <S%H5612><s%> Se-fer her a bill כְּרִיתֻת֙ <S%H3748><s%> ke-ri-Tut of divorcement וְנָתַ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-Tan and give בְּיָדָ֔הּ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Dah, [it] in her hand וְשִׁלְּחָ֖הּ <S%H7971><s%> ve-shil-le-Chah and send מִבֵּיתֽוֹ׃ <S%H1004><s%> mib-bei-To. her out of his house

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- is not יוּכַ֣ל <S%H3201><s%> yu-Chal may בַּעְלָ֣הּ <S%H1167><s%> ba'-Lah husband הָרִאשׁ֣וֹן <S%H7223><s%> ha-ri-Shon Her former אֲשֶֽׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-she-ro-Shi- who שִׁ֠לְּחָהּ <S%H7971><s%> le-chah which sent her away לָשׁ֨וּב <S%H7725><s%> la-Shuv her again לְקַחְתָּ֜הּ <S%H3947><s%> le-kach-Tah not take לִהְי֧וֹת <S%H1961><s%> lih-Yot become ל֣וֹ lo לְאִשָּׁ֗ה <S%H802><s%> le-'ish-Shah, to be his wife אַחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei after אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which הֻטַּמָּ֔אָה <S%H2930><s%> hut-tam-Ma-'ah, that she is defiled כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that תוֹעֵבָ֥ה <S%H8441><s%> to-'e-Vah for that [is] abomination הִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> hi he לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; the LORD וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo shall not תַחֲטִיא֙ <S%H2398><s%> ta-cha-Ti to sin אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, and thou shalt not cause the land אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> no-Ten giveth לְךָ֖ le-Cha נַחֲלָֽה׃ <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-Lah. thee [for] an inheritance ס sa-Mek
